name: Margherita
details: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Pepperoni
details: A popular pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni slices.

name: BBQ Chicken
details: Tangy BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.

name: Hawaiian
details: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, and pineapple.

name: Veggie Supreme
details: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and tomatoes.

name: Four Cheese
details: A blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and blue cheese on tomato sauce.

name: Meat Lovers
details: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon.

name: Buffalo Chicken
details: Spicy buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, grilled chicken, and blue cheese crumbles.

name: Mushroom
details: Garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, and a generous amount of fresh mushrooms.

name: Spinach & Feta
details: Garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, spinach, and feta cheese.
